TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lohok, title = Lohok, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lohok} }

S.FORM: Lohok Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Lohok a niyaro', 289 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 791 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 63 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 499 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 37 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 292 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis59 , Bunun1 , Truku1 , roma2 .
